name: Your Zone Reversible Comforter and Sham Set, Multi Stripe/Skylight

reviews.name: Your Zone Reversible Comforter and Sham Set, Multi Stripe/Skylight
reviews.reviewText: I got a new bedroom A while ago, and after looking at different stores for a nice bedding set I came across this set, since I saw it It totally caught my attention,It looks beautiful in person It goes perfect with any bedroom, when It appeared it was in store at my local wall wart I rushed to buy it,and god It's worth buying it , and let me tell you if you think of buying a pink sheet set, you can buy any sheet set, it will look prettier and it will match definitively I recommend this product.
reviews.title: Your Zone Reversible Conforter

reviews.name: Your Zone Reversible Comforter and Sham Set, Multi Stripe/Skylight
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased double bunks for my daughter and didn't want to spend a fortune on bedding. I purchased this comforter set and absolute love it and so does my daughter. It is super soft and bright. I teamed it up with the Hot pink eyelash plush pillows and the hot pink zone sheet sets and it looks amazing! I have washed the comforter sets and put them through the dryer and they still feel super soft and look great. The comforter is not too heavy, just right for CA weather. You will not be dissapointed with this comforter!
reviews.title: Your Zone Reversible Comforter and Sham Set, Multi

reviews.name: Your Zone Reversible Comforter and Sham Set, Multi Stripe/Skylight
reviews.reviewText: I got a full bed a couple weeks ago, and of course I needed a comforter. I went to Walmart and fell in love with this comforter. I bought it and thought it was amazing. Not only is it good looking and vibrant, but it is warm, soft and comfy. It goes perfectly with any room, and is a beautiful sight to wake up to. And the price isn't that bad, especially for the quality. Being a teenager myself I recommend this for any teenager that wants to perk up their room.
reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.name: Your Zone Reversible Comforter and Sham Set, Multi Stripe/Skylight
reviews.reviewText: this comforter is so soft! The kids love it! I was surprised it only came with a pillow case but that does allow for mixing and matching with different color zone sheets or other value sheets you can find. I bought the racy pink sheets.
reviews.title: Super soft comforter

reviews.name: Your Zone Reversible Comforter and Sham Set, Multi Stripe/Skylight
reviews.reviewText: This comforter is beautiful, the material feels so good and the weight is good if you keep your home about 70 degrees. I purchased this comforter for my (master) bedroom at the lake, it is fun, bright and looks so cheerful. I have a queen bed and have the "full/queen" size that fits it well. I was worried about the size and if it would cover a queen well...and it did although I do need to find a matching bed skirt, but it works with the stripes going horizontally or vertically.
reviews.title: Outstanding value and quality
